trans-unit.source: Represents information about a specific cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
This structure provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.

It is used instead of a reference to the actual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> container when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> gets a cell; for example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure for the specified cell.
This constructor associates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with the specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance that owns the cell container.
The cell for which information is to be generated.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure using the specified data item and column.
This constructor does not associate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with a specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance.
The data item for the row that contains the cell.
The column that contains the cell.
Gets the column that contains the cell.
The column that contains the cell.
Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current instance.

This method compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
The object to compare to the current instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison object represents the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure.
A hash code for the structure.
Gets a value that indicates whether the structure holds valid information.

This property verifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property is not <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property is not `null`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structure has valid information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell.
The data item for the row that contains the cell.
Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are equal.

This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
The first structure to compare.
The second structure to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are not equal.

This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
The first structure to compare.
The second structure to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures do not represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
